resources.string: Click a chord to play it, long-press to change it
Press your phone\'s "Menu" button for more options

SongWriter is an app designed to help musicians come up with chord sequences. To use the app, simply select a key by clicking on the dropdown menu on the far left. Then, select major or minor using the dropdown menu to the right of the first menu. Click "Create" to generate a random chord progression in the selected key. When you find one that looks good, press "Play" and the chords will be played, in order. If one chord doesn\'t sound right, long-press it and you can choose a new one! Click on a chord at any time to hear it. When you want to keep a set of chords, press the \'options\' button on your phone to save or load the chords. Thank you for using SongWriter! Please comment and rate on the Android Market.
